cast.overview: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and hijinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.
cast.title: M*A*S*H

details.biography: Francis Asbury Tarkenton (born February 3, 1940) is an American former professional football player who was a quarterback in the National Football League (NFL) for 18 seasons, primarily with the Minnesota Vikings. He played college football at the University of Georgia, where he was recognized as a twice first-team All-SEC, and was selected by the Vikings in the third round of the 1961 NFL Draft. After retiring from football, he became a media personality and computer software executive.
details.name: Fran Tarkenton
